fact: This branch is the largest and oldest branch of the U.S. military.
This branch is responsible for naval operations and projecting power across the seas.
This branch is known for its air superiority and global reach.
This branch is known for amphibious warfare and expeditionary operations.
This branch is responsible for maritime law enforcement, search and rescue, and national defense.
This branch was established in 2019 and is responsible for space-based military operations.
This branch's motto is 'Semper Fidelis', meaning 'Always Faithful'.
This branch operates the Global Positioning System (GPS).
This branch's core values are 'Honor, Courage, and Commitment'.
This branch was part of the Army until it became a separate service in 1947.
